titles.title: Because the Lord is my shepherd

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Because the Lord is my shepherd
I will fear no evil
But I will dwell in the house of the Lord
And Thy mercies shall follow me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lead me Lord like a shepherd
Lead me Lord like a shepherd
Lead me Lord like a shepherd lest I stray
Place your strong arms around me
Bear me up on your shoulders
Lead me Lord
Lead me Lord
Day by Day

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Restore my soul in green pastures
Lead me beside still waters
Restore my soul for Thy great name's sake
Let my paths be righteousness
